channel.title: dev on Dmitry's Website
channel.description: Recent content in dev on Dmitry's Website

item.title: My Projects
item.description: I can say that I’m a serial maker. From my early days in the Internet I try to create online projects with the ultimate goal to became independent in terms of work and finance. When I work for someone else I can’t say that every time I do the most interesting things out there, and this is where my side projects help me to keep going: I can learn whatever technology I want, I can do whatever I want in a way I want :) So it benefits a lot.
